key_talking_points: Sam Bennett (FLA) scores, assisted by Anton Lundell (FLA) and Carter Verhaeghe (FLA) at 2:07 of the first. Florida extends their lead to 5-4.
The goal was a result of sustained pressure in the offensive zone following a series of blocked shots.
